title: Some plugins that claim `MPL 1.1 License` is actually close source
content: Hello, I noticed that some plugins that claim of MPL 1.1 License is actually close source, furthermore, some of those even have “Recommended” tag. Since this is a big misleading considering these plugins actually have very broad permissions, I consider those plugins as abuse. I reported them 1 or 2 months ago but no response. I don't want to list those names out in case it was just the author selected a wrong selection, but i do believe that the author should correct that, and the more important thing is Mozilla should check this more carefully.
creator: zxkmm

title: Downloaded the latest version from Mozilla website but Horizontal scroll bar still missing for certain url
content:
The horizontal scroll bars had been missing for certain URL in firefox since mid last year 2023. I just downloaded the latest version for windows 11 and it is still missing.

I have checked the settings > General > browsing > related to scrollbars and they are all checked, namely: - use autoscrolling - use smooth scrolling

But it is still missing! I generally use firefox for my work and Google chrome for my personal use - to compartmentalize my browsing content/history. Now I will have to ditch firefox and use chrome only for both work and personal if this is not fixed.

title: Was maxRichResults' maximum changed from 10 to 6?
content:
Hi, I've been using FireFox for many years now, and ever since I started using it I had browser.urlbar.maxRichResults set to 10 and it showed the top 10 visited websites when I click the adressbar. It is still set to 10 in about:config, however it will only show me a maximum of 6. I can change the number to anything below 6 and it'll work fine, but any number above six it doesn't work. Is this the result of a new update? Can I do anything to get it back to displaying 10 entries instead of 6?

Hi, ik gebruik al jaren FireFox, en al die tijd heb ik browser.urlbar.maxRichResults op 10 staan en als ik op de adresbar klikte kreeg ik logischerwijs mijn top 10 bezochte websites te zien die ik dan kon aanklikken. De instelling staat nog steeds op 10 in about:config, echter laat de adresbar me sinds gisteren slechts 6 websites zien. Ik kan het nummer veranderen naar alles vanaf 6 of eronder en dat werkt, maar alles boven 6 werkt niet. Komt dit door een recente update? Kan ik iets doen om toch weer 10 websites te zien te krijgen?

MVG Eric
creator: eric_slingerland

title: Cannot sign into websites via my Google account
content: Whenever I try to sign into any website via my Google account, it takes me to a blank white popup that I cannot interact with (I can only close it). I've tried clearing my cookies, which almost works - it does the proper Google popup and lets me input my username and password, but I don't actually get signed in - and when I try to sign in again the popup is blank. This also happens in troubleshooter mode, so my extensions probably aren't what are causing this problem. Does anyone have any idea what's happening? Thanks in advance.

title: 2-Questions re: IGHome (Firefox)
content:
1. I use a startpage called IGHome. That address is set as my default to open to. When it opens I notice that the address is not secure. When I add https:// in front of it, it does in-fact open, which is good. Even though I added that prefix to the address on the Internet Options page in my system, it still continues to open the old 'unsecured' way. I also cleaned IGHome out of my system before resaving it. Is there anyway to get my system to recognize the secure version? And, if I open any sites with passwords on the unsecured version, they DO open as secured so in reality I am still safe (even though my system is not opening the https site).

2. Also, on my IGHome page, there are 'Show Your History' and 'Show your Bookmarks' tabs at the top right in the toolbar. When I used to open them they would open almost flush right. Now they open almost in the center. Is there a way to make them open in their previous flush right location again?

Thank you in-advance for any time and assistance!

Sincerely,

Dana Desjardins Email removed for privacy

title: Search buttons no longer open website automatically
content:
Currently on the latest version. Either this version or a version before seems to have broken a functionality that's been there for years. With the search bar, you can have it empty, and select a search option, say, Youtube, and it'll open up YouTube. If you have a search term in the search window, obviously it'll open youtube in the search page with those search terms. I've used this for years and years to quickly go to pages such as YouTube, Amazon, etc, without having to have a separate bookmark.

Now, if you have the search bar empty and click on YouTube, or Amazon, or any other installed search option, it doesn't default open that page. It only opens when you have something typed into this.

Idk if this is a "feature update" or bug, but it's worked the same way for years, and now no longer does.
creator: drummerdude152002
